Home.hero-subtitle: Discover rare books across European libraries and connect with readers who can help you digitize them
Home.search-description: Search through collections of European libraries to locate rare and hard-to-find books
Home.scan-description: Request book scans from other users in local libraries and scan books yourself.
Home.print-description: Receive your legally compliant, high-quality physical private copy, delivered anonymously to your specified location.
Home.join-community: Join a community dedicated to preserving and sharing access to rare books
Home.join-thousands: Join thousands of book enthusiasts preserving literary heritage

WaitingListForm.title: Join The Waiting List
WaitingListForm.description1: Be among the first to receive your printed book!
WaitingListForm.description2: As we`re just starting out, we`re currently collecting our first orders.
WaitingListForm.description3: Join the waiting list by filling out the form below. We'll send you email as soon as we are ready to deliver Œbœks.
WaitingListForm.description4: We will print the book you want. Please provide a correct PDF file. Use the instructions to create a correct PDF file: <guidlines>here</guidlines>
WaitingListForm.description5: Attention: The book, that you scan, must be obtained legally, by EU law. This means you must have a photo of the library checkout receipt. Please upload it below.
WaitingListForm.avoid-real-name: Please avoid showing your real name, for your privacy
WaitingListForm.link-label: Add Link to Source With Your Book File
WaitingListForm.link-placeholder: Enter link to book file here
WaitingListForm.library-receipt: Add a Photo of The Library Checkout Receipt
WaitingListForm.success-message: Your scan request has been submitted successfully. We will process it and get back to you soon.
WaitingListForm.error-message: There was an error submitting your scan request. Please try again.
WaitingListForm.required-fields: Please fill in all required fields
WaitingListForm.add-link: Add a Link to a Book File From Your Storage
WaitingListForm.link-instruction: A link to the book file should be publicly accessible for download. Avoid personal data in the link name.

Terms.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.1: Welcome to OpenEuropeBooks™ / Œbœks™! <guidelines> These Terms of Use ('Terms') govern your access to and use of our service ('Service'), which allows users to process copyrighted materials for private, non-commercial use in compliance with Finnish and EU copyright law. </guidelines> By using the Service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.

section2.title: 2. Acceptable Use Policy
section2.1: 2.1 Permitted Use <guidelines>You may use the Service only to process copyrighted materials for your personal, non-commercial use, provided that:</guidelines>
section2.1-1: You have legally obtained the source material (e.g., borrowed from a library or purchased).
section2.1-2: You do not share, distribute, or reproduce the materials beyond your personal use.
section2.1-3: You comply with all applicable laws, including the Finnish Copyright Act (Section 12) and EU copyright directives.
section2.2-1: You may not use the Service to:
section2.2-2: Upload, share, or distribute materials that infringe any copyright or intellectual property rights.
section2.2-3: Circumvent any technological protection measures (e.g., DRM) on copyrighted works.
section2.2-4: Use the Service for commercial purposes or to distribute materials to the public.
section2.2-5: Engage in any activity that violates Finnish or EU law.

section3.title: 3. User Representations and Warranties
section3.1: By using the Service, you represent and warrant that:
section3.2: You have the legal right to use the materials you upload or process.
section3.3: Your use of the Service complies with all applicable laws and these Terms.
section3.4: You will not use the Service to infringe the rights of any third party.

section4.title: 4. Data Privacy and Security
section4.1-1: Any materials you upload to the Service are processed temporarily and deleted immediately after processing. We do not retain or share your materials.
section4.2-1: All data is transmitted and stored securely in compliance with GDPR and Finnish data protection laws.
section4.3-1: You are responsible for ensuring the security and confidentiality of your account and materials.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
section5.1-1: You retain all rights to any materials you upload or process using the Service. We do not claim ownership or license rights to your content.

section6.2-1: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless OpenEuropeBooks™ / Œbœks™ / Smart Paper Oy, its affiliates, and employees from any claims, damages, or liabilities resulting from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.

section7.title: 7. Termination
section7.1: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Service if you violate these Terms or applicable laws, including copyright laws. Violations may result in immediate termination without notice.

section8.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section8.1: These Terms are governed by the laws of Finland. Any disputes arising from your use of the Service will be resolved exclusively in the courts of Finland.
